text: Silver City is a 1951 American Western movie directed by Byron Haskin and starring Edmond O'Brien, Yvonne De Carlo, Barry Fitzgerald. It was adapted from the 1947 novel High Vermilion by Luke Short and was released under that title in the UK. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1951 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Byron Haskin
title: Silver City (1951 movie)
